title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite ;Design of Machine ElementsFormulation of Optimization Problems; Analytical Methods of Optimization; Numerical Methods: Unconstrained optimization of one Variable; Unconstrained optimization of Many Variables; Constrained Optimization of Many Variables: Linear and Nonlinear Programming; General Design Applications.
